mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_MENU
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_app = #{guid_app,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_func = #{guid_func,jdbcType=varchar},
menu_name = #{menu_name,jdbcType=varchar},
menu_label = #{menu_label,jdbcType=varchar},
menu_code = #{menu_code,jdbcType=varchar},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
ui_entry = #{ui_entry,jdbcType=varchar},
menu_level = #{menu_level,jdbcType=decimal},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_root = #{guid_root,jdbcType=varchar},
display_order = #{display_order,jdbcType=decimal},
image_path = #{image_path,jdbcType=varchar},
expand_path = #{expand_path,jdbcType=varchar},
menu_seq = #{menu_seq,jdbcType=varchar},
open_mode = #{open_mode,jdbcType=varchar},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
